Accuracy.description: The estimated horizontal accuracy radius in meters of this location.

Altitude.description: The altitude of this location in meters above the WGS84 reference ellipsoid.

Bearing.description: The bearing at the time of this location in degrees.

BearingAccuracy.description: The estimated bearing accuracy in degrees of this location.

MSLAltitude.description: The Mean Sea Level altitude of this location in meters.

MSLAltitudeAccuracy.description: The estimated Mean Sea Level altitude accuracy in meters.

Speed.description: The speed at the time of this location in meters per second.

SpeedAccuracy.description: The estimated speed accuracy in meters per second of this location.

Time.description: The time the update was received.
